subject: Fw: Thanks for your recent refinance loan request, we are accepting your refinance debt request
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$338,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest entire payment!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this simple form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
 
http://ceizvqryvedfilles.com/
